DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study assess safety , tolerability potential immune response AMG 785 follow single subcutaneous ( SC , injection skin ) dose administration healthy postmenopausal Japanese woman .
DOC.brief_title: A Single-dose Study Evaluating AMG 785 Healthy Postmenopausal Japanese Women
DOC.criteria: Japanese subject must first ( 4 grandparent , biologic parent subject born Japan ) , second ( 4 grandparent biological parent born Japan ) third ( 4 grandparent born Japan ) generation Japanese Body mass index ≤ 25 kg/m2 , inclusive screening Postmenopausal female define 12 continuous month spontaneous amenorrhea confirm serum folliclestimulating hormone ( FSH ) result > 40mIU/mL , 6 week postsurgical bilateral oophorectomy ( without hysterectomy ) document medical history ( verified operative note , available ) Osteoporosis , define bone mineral density ( BMD ) Tscores lumbar spine ( L1L4 ) total evaluable vertebra ( few L1L4 ) ; femoral neck ≤ 2.5 History vertebral fracture fragility fracture wrist , humerus , hip pelvis ; Diagnosed condition affect bone metabolism
